mapper.insert: insert into product_info ( product_name, product_price, product_stock, product_description, product_icon, product_standard, product_tips, product_labels, product_unit, product_number, create_time, creator, update_time, updater ) values ( #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, #{productIcon}, #{productStandard}, #{productTips}, #{productLabels}, #{productUnit}, #{productNumber}, now(), #{creator}, now(), #{updater} )
mapper.delete: update product_info set enable_flag=0 where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select * from product_info where enable_flag=1 and product_status=#{status}
mapper.update: update product_info set product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_stock=#{productStock}, product_description=#{productDescription}, product_icon=#{productIcon}, product_standard=#{productStandard}, product_tips=#{productTips}, product_labels=#{productLabels}, product_unit=#{productUnit}, product_number=#{productNumber}, update_time=now(),selectProductInfosByPage updater=#{updater} where product_id=#{productId} and enable_flag=1

select * from product_info where product_number=#{productNumber} and enable_flag=1
